Json2Buffer
SQL
func:
//INSERT INTO sensor_aggr VALUES (epoch [int], device [text], sensor [text], value [real])
return { topic: "INSERT INTO sensor_aggr VALUES ("+msg.payload.timestape+", '"+msg.payload.device+"', '"+msg.payload.sensor+"', "+msg.payload.value+")" };

name: Handle MeshSync
Sync Protokoll
info:
# NodeSyncRequest[5] empfangen
 -  mit NodeSyncReply[6] beantworten
 - Mesh-Stauts Online
    - global."MeshState"

# NodeSyncReply[6] empfangen
 - Topologie speichern
    - global."MeshTopology"

# Trigger (5s) nach letztem Request
 - NodeSyncRequest[5] senden

# WatchDog (10s) nach letztem Request
 - Mesh-Stauts Offline
    - global."MeshState"

name: Handle MeshOTA
OTA Protokoll
info:
# File-Upload empfangen
- File in flow.otaFile speichern
- OTA::Announce[10] senden
    - `{`
    - `  "dest": Partner-ID,`
    - `  "from": NodeRed-ID,`
    - `  "type": 10,`
    - `  "role":fw.variant,`
    - `  "hardware":fw.hw,`
    - `  "md5":fw.md5,`
    - `  "forced":true/false,`
    - `  "noPart":fw.noPart`
    - `}`

# OTA::DataRequest[11] empfangen
- Telegramm:
    - `{`
    - `  "dest": NodeRed-ID,`
    - `  "from": Partner-ID,`
    - `  "type": 11,`
    - `  "role":fw.variant,`
    - `  "hardware":fw.hw,`
    - `  "md5":fw.md5,`
    - `  "forced":true/false,`
    - `  "noPart":fw.noPart,`
    - `  "partNo":bufferSegment`
    - `}`
- Datenblock auswÃ¤hlen
- OTA::Data[12] senden
    - `{`
    - `  "dest": NodeRed-ID,`
    - `  "from": Partner-ID,`
    - `  "type": 12,`
    - `  "role":fw.variant,`
    - `  "hardware":fw.hw,`
    - `  "md5":fw.md5,`
    - `  "forced":true/false,`
    - `  "noPart":fw.noPart,`
    - `  "partNo":bufferSegment,`
    - `  "data":base64String`
    - `}`

# Trigger (5s) nach letztem Request
 - NodeSyncRequest[5] senden

# WatchDog (10s) nach letztem Request
 - Mesh-Stauts Offline
    - global."MeshState"
